name: HaemophilusInfluenzaeTypeBHibVaccine
title: Haemophilus Influenzae Type B (Hib) Vaccine
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent Haemophilus influenzae type B (Hib) vaccine codes.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Immunization, Administered.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with all Haemophilus influenzae type b (Hib) vaccine codes. This is a grouping of CVX codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

contains.display: diphtheria, tetanus toxoids and acellular pertussis vaccine, Haemophilus influenzae type b conjugate, and poliovirus vaccine, inactivated (DTaP-Hib-IPV)
